actuals.description: Recorded actual hours and related metadata for work items.

columns.org_subunit: Organizational subunit code for the team that logged hours.
columns.location: Work location associated with the logged hours entry.
columns.pid: Project identifier associated with the hours entry.
columns.project_name: Human-readable project label tied to the hours entry.
columns.period: Date or datetime representing when the hours were logged.
columns.org_unit: Higher-level organizational unit associated with the entry.
columns.product_line: Product line grouping for the work item.
columns.product_group: Product group classification for the work item.
columns.year: Calendar year extracted/stored for the entry.
columns.product_segment: Product segment classification for the work item.
columns.type_of_hours: Category of hours (e.g., actuals vs. other types).

plan_demand.description: Planned or forecasted hours and project metadata.

columns.project_name: Name of the project for which hours are planned.
columns.product_line: Product line grouping for the planned item.
columns.product_segment: Product segment classification for the planned item.
columns.org_unit: Organizational unit associated with the plan.
columns.org_subunit: Organizational subunit associated with the plan.
columns.comment: Free-form notes or descriptions for the plan entry.
columns.project_subtype: More specific subtype of the project.
columns.current_aop: Current plan or budget reference label.
columns.ny_aop: Next-year plan or budget reference label.
columns.project_status: Status of the project in the planning context.
columns.project_manager: Contact or owner for the project.
columns.tech_project_manager: Technical contact or owner for the project.
columns.cluster: Grouping or cluster label for the project.
columns.customer_region: Customer region tied to the project.
columns.last_change_ts: Timestamp of the last change to this plan entry.
columns.changed_by: User or system that last modified the entry.
columns.month: Month (date/datetime) for which hours are planned.
columns.location: Location associated with the planned work.

staff_capacity.description: Staffing capacity or allocation records, including planned hours.

columns.product_line: Product line associated with the capacity record.
columns.product_segment: Product segment associated with the capacity record.
columns.org_unit: Organizational unit for the staff allocation.
columns.org_subunit: Organizational subunit for the staff allocation.
columns.comment: Free-form notes for the capacity record.
columns.project_type: Type/category of work the staff is allocated to.
columns.current_aop: Current plan or budget reference label.
columns.ny_aop: Next-year plan or budget reference label.
columns.project_status: Status of the associated project or allocation.
columns.project_manager: Project manager for the allocation context.
columns.tech_project_manager: Technical project manager for the allocation context.
columns.cluster: Grouping or cluster label for the allocation.
columns.legacy_pid: Legacy project identifier associated with the allocation.
columns.last_change_ts: Timestamp of the last change to the record.
columns.changed_by: User or system that last modified the record.
columns.hours: Numeric measure of capacity or allocated hours.
columns.month: Month (date/datetime) for which capacity is recorded.
columns.location: Location associated with the staff allocation.

cost_factor.description: Reference table for cost factors by location and year.

columns.location: Location for which the cost factor applies.
columns.confirmed_flag: Boolean indicating whether the factor is confirmed.

plan_scenarios.description: Stored planning scenarios including payloads and status.

columns.user_id: User who created or owns the scenario.
User who created or owns the scenario.
User who created or owns the scenario.

columns.scenario_id: Scenario identifier this approval refers to.
columns.created_at: Creation timestamp of the approval request.
columns.approved_at: Timestamp when approval was given, if applicable.

scenario_variants.description: Variants of scenarios with metadata and payloads.

columns.parent_id: Identifier of the parent scenario, if any.
columns.label: Human-readable label for the variant.

scenario_history.description: History of scenario interactions and logs.

columns.id: Primary key for the history record.
columns.scenario_id: Scenario identifier this history belongs to.
columns.question: Question or prompt associated with the event.
columns.status: Status at the time of the event.
columns.message: Message content captured for the event.
columns.deltas: Serialized changes captured in the event.
columns.warnings: Serialized warnings recorded during the event.
